name: La Martina
description:
Bio

Learn language the way its meant to be learned: through immersion.

La Martina will blend the action of a Spy thriller with immersive language learning for an unprecedented interactive experience.  Build your vocabulary, strike up conversations and boost your confidence  while walking through cobblestone alleys and elegant Haciendas.  Together, we can accelerate your knowledge of Spanish with an OSS training program that takes you from complete beginner to confident conversational fluency.  

This is the first and simplest iteration of the game and functions as demonstration of what we're building. It includes:

  • A 3D 1940's Madrid nightclub - La Martina.  Here, each object highlights to tell you it's Spanish name
  •  A quick conversation with the bartender for a timed mini-game
  •  An OSS themed flash card deck to build additional vocabulary
  •  Lastly, a set of storyline surveillance tapes to improve your listening comprehension skills - and give you a background of the gameplay universe. 
Download Info: 

Download and unzip the file. This is a PC/desktop only release. 

Controls
  • WASD keys to move around
  • E to interact with objects
  • Move mouse to explore
  • Enter and keyboard for flashcards
